name: BlockheadsServer
description:
Please note - this is not the full playable game of The Blockheads, but a server app to allow people on mobile devices to play together.

With this server app, up to 32 players can play The Blockheads together in persistent online worlds. Simply create a new world, give it a name, choose a port and hit start. Then anyone playing The Blockheads on your local network can connect, and (if your firewall allows) so can anyone online.

For more information about The Blockheads, please visit theblockheads.net
